comments.text: I normally use Firefox with keyboard navigation as much as possible.  Today Zimba has been REALLY SLOW (backend server problems) and Firefox would be 100% unresponsive for 30+ seconds until the message I clicked on would load.  This was my initial impression, but I found that using a mouse would allow me to switch tabs or interact with chrome just fine.
